venue.name: The Healing Center at Our Weeping Angel Foundation

item.description:
Ever wonder if you've lived before?  Ever met someone

and felt like you already know them?  Do you have skills

and talents for which you've never had training?

 

Kathryn McGlynn, Certified Hypnotist and Time Traveler,

leads you on a hypnotic exploration of your other lives

where you will discover how they may be affecting your

current life and relationships.

 

Learning about past lives can be helpful in physical healing,

removing fears and apprehensions, releasing oneself from

unwanted behaviors, clarifying life purpose and core values,

recognizing people we have known before, and understanding

issues in relationships.

 

Bring a small pillow and light blanket if desired. 

You will be invited to stretch out and relax.

group.name: Past Life Regression & Professional Hypnosis Group

item.name: Hypnosis Seminar : Past Life Regression
